name: Dead Spirit (snowirbis)
description:
WASD or Arrow keys to MOVE and JUMP

(ZQSD for AZERTY keyboards)

Space bar to ATTACK

Left shift to DASH

For Gamepad (xbox or others) controllers, you'll need to download the windows build at https://skyppy.itch.io/dead-spirit

A Journey in Hell !

You are the death, guiding the spirits through hell, but only the brave will survive and reach the fields of Elysium.

Credit :

Snowirbis and Skyppy - Development

Rieyden and Joris Halgand - Arts

https://www.instagram.com/rieyden/
